quote: I’m not lazy, I’m just on energy-saving mode.
author: Anonymous

quote: Common sense is like deodorant. The people who need it most never use it.
author: Bill Murray

quote: Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
author: Mallory Hopkins

quote: I put my phone down for two minutes and… 27 notifications. Am I famous yet?
author: Internet User

quote: When nothing goes right, go left.
author: Meme Wisdom

quote: The early bird can have the worm, because worms are gross and mornings are stupid.
author: Garfield

quote: I’m multitasking: I can listen, ignore, and forget at the same time.
author: Anonymous

quote: That moment when you finish Netflix. All of it.
author: Meme Legend

quote: Running late is my cardio.
author: Carrie Bradshaw

quote: Calories: tiny creatures that live in your closet and sew your clothes tighter at night.
author: Meme Internet

quote: Monday is proof that time travel exists — I swear it was Friday 5 minutes ago.
author: Office Worker

quote: I wish my bank account grew as fast as my laundry pile.
author: Adulting Problems

quote: Silence is golden… unless you have kids, then silence is suspicious.
author: Parenting 101

quote: I need a six-month vacation, twice a year.
author: Meme Overlord

quote: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I’m not too sure.
author: Meme Philosopher

quote: I don’t trip, I do random gravity checks.
author: Internet Humor

quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: I followed my heart, and it led me to the fridge.
author: Meme Gourmet

quote: Running out of data is the modern version of running out of oxygen.
author: Digital Survivor

quote: Sarcasm: my brain’s natural defense against stupidity.
author: Meme Scholar

quote: Vodka may not be the answer, but it’s worth a shot.
author: Meme Bartender

quote: Why fall in love when you can fall asleep?
author: Meme Romantic

quote: I’d lose weight, but I don’t like losing.
author: Meme Fitness Coach

quote: Of course I talk to myself. Sometimes I need expert advice.
author: Meme Guru

quote: I’m not arguing, I’m just explaining why I’m right.
author: Meme Lawyer

quote: My WiFi went down for five minutes, so I had to talk to my family. They seem like nice people.
author: Meme Teenager

quote: Life happens, coffee helps.
author: Meme Barista

quote: The fridge is a magical place where I go to remember what I forgot to buy.
author: Meme Shopper

quote: Relationship status: made dinner for two. Ate both.
author: Meme Chef

quote: If sleep is so important, why does school start so early?
author: Meme Student

quote: Be strong… I whispered to my WiFi signal.
author: Meme Millennial

quote: Don’t worry if plan A fails. There are 25 more letters.
author: Meme Optimist

quote: Sometimes I just look at my paycheck and laugh.
author: Meme Employee

quote: Stressed spelled backwards is desserts. Coincidence? I think not.
author: Meme Foodie

quote: I don’t need a hair stylist, my pillow gives me a new style every morning.
author: Meme Sleeper

quote: Save water, drink coffee.
author: Meme Eco-Friendly

quote: I’m not clumsy, I’m just testing gravity repeatedly.
author: Meme Scientist

quote: Love is blind, but marriage is a real eye-opener.
author: Pauline Thomason

quote: If Cinderella’s shoe fit perfectly, why did it fall off?
author: Meme Philosopher

quote: Some people just need a high-five. In the face. With a chair.
author: Meme Savage

quote: I clean when I’m angry. Which means my house is a mess, but I’m calm.
author: Meme Zen Master

quote: Being an adult is basically walking around wondering what you forgot.
author: Meme Grown-Up

quote: I’d agree with you, but then we’d both be wrong.
author: Meme Joker

quote: Exercise? I thought you said extra fries.
author: Meme Snack Lover

quote: I’m not lazy. I’m highly motivated to do nothing.
author: Meme Procrastinator

quote: That awkward moment when you can’t hear someone, so you just keep smiling and nodding.
author: Meme Introvert

quote: My bed and I love each other, but my alarm clock doesn’t want us together.
author: Meme Sleeper

quote: Don’t quit your daydream.
author: Meme Dreamer

quote: Brains are awesome. I wish everybody had one.
author: Meme Savage

quote: Life’s too short to be serious all the time. So if you can’t laugh at yourself, call me and I’ll do it for you.
author: Meme Friend
